name: Banco Bilbao Vizcaya Argentaria, S.A.
description: Banco Bilbao Vizcaya Argentaria, S.A. provides retail banking, wholesale banking, and asset management services primarily in Spain, Mexico, Turkey, South America, rest of Europe, the United States, and Asia. The company offers savings accounts, demand deposits, and time deposits; and residential mortgage, other household, credit card, and enterprises and public sector loans, as well as consumer finance. It provides insurance and asset management business, including corporate, commercial, SME, payment systems, retail, private and investment banking, pension and life insurance, leasing, factoring, and brokerage. The company provides its products through online and mobile channels. Banco Bilbao Vizcaya Argentaria, S.A. was founded in 1857 and is headquartered in Bilbao, Spain.
